title: End of Studies Project :
descriptionProjet: The end of studies project (PFE) and the end of studies internship refer to the same reality. It is a defined period during which the student joins a company to carry out a project. The PFE marks the end of the university or professional training curriculum. The end of studies internship corresponds to the legal framework in which the end of studies project is carried out.
descriptionnF: The Women's Shelter provides support and refuge to women and families affected by domestic violence. It aims to empower them with independence and autonomy through a safe environment, counseling services, and educational programs.
